desc: A rare crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Ark
lore: A rare crystal that releases two shining wings. It is an item required to evolve the mock Unit modeled after Ark even further. It is said that it appeared when the pair who had desired for hundreds of years to be reunited finally joined hands. It came into Noel's possession after the Oracle Knight and the Shrine Maiden gave it to a certain Summoner, lighting his face up with a childlike smile befitting of his true age.
name: Twin Stones
